lender.name: Sunny & Luna
lender.loan_because: work makes you happy and happy people are good company

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference to a fellow entreprenuer.
lender.occupational_info: Sales.

lender.name: Rajesh Ullatil
lender.loan_because: I really appreciate hard working people. From Kiva I came to know that many such hardworking people around world need financial assistance. If I can make a difference in their life with my small loan, I will be more than happy!
lender.occupational_info: I write software code for a major bank.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel great to know that I\\\'m helping someone that is in need. People need help, and I\'m going to do something about it.
lender.occupational_info: I am 18 years old and I am a Massage Therapist. I help promote good health and I love doing it. I also volunteer my services to schools, churches,charities, fund raisers ect...

lender.name: Steuart
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping people help themselves will pay dividends to the entire world.

lender.name: Winn
lender.loan_because: I should do my best to help those who try to help themself.
lender.occupational_info: I want to pursue a happier life as them. So I should give them a hand and learn from them. Then I would share the piece of happiness and joy.

lender.name: Joe and Kim
lender.loan_because: I love the innovative spirit of the people applying for the loans
lender.occupational_info: I work in the medical imaging department of a local hospital

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: It is a great business lesson I can share with my boys while helping the world become a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I supply data to companies trying to locate new customers. I live in Colorado and enjoy it very much.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: Empowering the poor through sharing is an essential aspect of God's plan for human flourishing

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: I Love to help people accomplish their dreams because i know what it feels like to have people help me accomplish mine.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: Money only buys happinness up to a certain point (approx. USD$10,000 per capita - read Bill McKibben's new book 'Deep Economy' for more info on this figure). Most people in the western world have far surpassed that amount. Instead of having money sitting in a bank in an effort to gain wealth, why not use it to make someone else's life a bit more happy?

lender.name: Tom and Lorelei
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can! The Lord has blessed us and there are so many that need a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: We build up families by caring, teaching and loving. In the name of Christ.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: a loan is needed.
lender.occupational_info: Learning all I can in order to do as much as I can when I make my time come.

lender.name: Matthew & Amanda
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach very young children how to become good people.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I've benefitted from loans in the past that have been very important to me. I'm happy to be in a position to be able to help make a difference by making important loans to others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a large transportation company that moves goods all over the world. As the result, I'm lucky enough to have seen much of it.

lender.name: Team Weldon
lender.loan_because: Because everyone should be able to follow their dreams, and because we all need to be connected.

lender.name: Dave
lender.occupational_info: I write software programs.

lender.name: kathy
lender.loan_because: I live Shelby, Michigan, a beautiful place,, i can help other people
lender.occupational_info: I work in an emergency room and we have all the supplies and antibodics we need, i need to offer others assistance that have less.

lender.name: James M
lender.loan_because: I want to help folks in other places to be self-sufficient. I've had friends and family help me to get established in my career, so I would like to help others do the same. I am honored to get the chance to loan funds to others in this way.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an attorney to help American soldiers who want to leave the military. I do this because I believe strongly in peace and believe that God wants us all to do what we can to make the world more peaceful.

lender.name: Yasmein
lender.loan_because: It's part of what I can do to put words into action.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: I need a loan to fence my fruit farm and construct a water tank for harvesting rain water to be used in watering my trees during the dry season
lender.occupational_info: My work involve growing grafted fruit trees like oranges,mangoes,avocados,bananas and pawpaws. Currently I have grafted 80 Mango trees and 65 Orange trees which I expect to mature to commercial production by year 2008.

lender.name: CHARLES
lender.loan_because: OUR SON AND DAUGHTER -IN -LAW GAVE MY WIFE AND I A GIFT CERTIFICATE TO KIVA. AS WE LOOKED THROUGH THE FOLKS TO LEND TO WE BECAME EXTREMELY INTERESTED IN THEIR WORKS AND DREAMS.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I own and operate a bakery.

lender.name: Lyzette
lender.loan_because: One person can make a difference... and a difference is what we need.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: What is a small amount to us can make such a difference to someone in another country. It\'s great also to see directly who the funds help and how they are used.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people from foreign countries who have come to the United States to improve their lives.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: It might make a difference and I appreciate entrepreneurial spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I help run a small municipal government that provides services (police, fire, streets, sewer, water, and recreational ) to the citizens of Yreka, California.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I have been so blessed in this life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a firefighter paramedic in Kansas City, KS. I respond to medical emergencies and firegrounds. I try to help people when they need it.

lender.name: Torsten
lender.loan_because: It should be the nature of human beeings to help each other !!!! This idea which Kiva sets free is hopefully spreading the whole world and gives everybody a real chance to boost their lifes with good ideas .... I LOVE IT !!!! Thank`s KIVA !!!!
lender.occupational_info: I do ethnical business help to establish the cultural creative economy with products from the world to the world and do my best to support fair trade and a lifestyle of health and sustainability ....

lender.name: The Parkers
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate and want to help give a hand up
lender.occupational_info: My job is to design, produce and promote the use of products that are needed in the medical community for diagnosing illnesses.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Oprah told me.
lender.occupational_info: I add AND subtract.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I believe venture money is the best way to build an economy.
lender.occupational_info: I help small startup high-tech companies incorporate and position themselves to raise venture capital.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: It is the best way to help people get out of poverty that I have found.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I saw an article in a Computer Technology education magazine and it mentioned Guatemala or Togo, two countries dear to my heart. A great friend of mine just came back from medical mission work in Togo and my son was adopted from Guatemala. When you see people trying so hard to better themselves, you want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help raise funds for my college through writing grants for government agencies or foundations.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs some help at some point, and if we can, how can we not assist them?

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Annette & Tim
lender.loan_because: We believe it can make a difference

lender.name: gardner&naomi
lender.loan_because: we\'d like to create a dual power to replace the corrupt power of capitalism!

lender.name: Sunshine
lender.occupational_info: Twitter: @fairysweetgirl

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to create their own future.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money to help fund a university.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: Kiva is important & needed. This works. I am glad to have a way to help these entrepreneur.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist, mainly a portrait artist. I work mostly in pencil. I add color with colored pencils & pastels. My portfolio is full of portraits of all different kinds of people: rich, poor, short, tall, quiet, boisterous, happy, confused, mischievous, dutiful... all great people in their own way.

lender.name: Hannah & Madi
lender.loan_because: Life is better when we help each other.
lender.occupational_info: Hannah is a parent and teacher. Madi is one of Hannah's wonderful daughters.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: It is a great responsibility to help others with what you are given. The world is harsh, life doesn't have to be.
lender.occupational_info: I take X-rays, CT Scans, and MRI's of the insides of people.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: A small act can have a large positive impact on another persons life.

lender.name: Roberto
lender.loan_because: I love to see the smiles on people\'s faces. \r\n

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance as a tool for eliminating poverty.

lender.name: Cam
lender.loan_because: There are people who need this money more than I ever could. Hopefully my initial \"investment\" can turn into money that I can continue to lend to others.
lender.occupational_info: I fix and maintain computers and electronics for an architecture business.

lender.name: dan
lender.loan_because: Guess I am an idealist. I can complain about the way things are in the world, or I can do something. I choose to do.

lender.name: Human
lender.loan_because: Human help human.
lender.occupational_info: I am a human.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: It makes me very happy to loan money to enthusiastic and hard-working people. If we all work together to create a better world, with an attitude of surrender to God's will, then anything is possible. I especially hope and pray that children all over the world will have enough to eat, a nice place to live, and good teachers and schools.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I am studying software engineering. For several months out of each year, I work as a volunteer in the charitable projects of Amma, a saint and humanitarian from southern India. At other times, I drive a big truck across the USA and sometimes Canada.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people to improve their lives in a sustainable way rather than giving them handouts that only help temporarily.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: I saw the story about Kiva on Front Line and I was struck by how far a small amount of money can go toward lifting someone out of poverty. Addressing global poverty is very important to me and this seems to be a great way to be a part of the solution.
lender.occupational_info: During the week, I develop software for a huge American corporation. On the weekends, I play drums for various local bands.

lender.name: Frilly Lilly
lender.occupation: We create Bath and Body Products
lender.loan_because: Every business needs to start somewhere. Frilly Lilly believes in giving back and helping whenever possible. Kiva allows us to help small businesses and entrepreneurs all around the world.
lender.occupational_info:
Since the launch of their new dessert-inspired product line in September of 2005, Frilly Lilly has become an instant sensation both in Calgary and abroad, as the line was quickly picked up by Fred Segal in Santa Monica, Kitson in Los Angeles, as well as The Palms and The Wynn hotels in Las Vegas!
Debra Van Dyke, the visionary behind Frilly Lilly, opened the beauty boutique initially specializing in waxing, manicures, and pedicures. It was her vision to create "a product that does all the right things when we’re doing services but also smells wonderful and looks great on the side of your tub.” It was this approach that guided the development of the entire Frilly Lilly body care line, says Debra, whose team worked for two fun years creating and testing the products, letting the clientele of Frilly Lilly's Calgary flagship store to be the first to try them out.
The result is the whimsical and feminine frilly lilly line, featuring sensational 'flavors' and vintage-inspired packaging. With an assortment of treats from bath bombs shaped and hand decorated as an assortment of petits fours and cupcakes to a variety of body butters, lotions, lip products, and a line of exciting nail polishes, all of the products are used in the spa services at frilly lilly!
Debra oversees the frilly lilly product line as well as the beauty boutique along side her two children, Lisa and Jeremy. The frilly lilly boutique has been recognized as one of the best places for waxing in Calgary, and in addition to carrying their own product line, also carry the latest trends in accessories fit for any fashionista.
With the brand quickly expanding in Canada, the United States, and soon to be worldwide, there hasn’t been a better time to indulge without ever gaining a pound!

lender.name: Ethan
lender.loan_because: I'm curious to see what happens. If this is successful I would consider loaning more. Also, why not encourage entrepenuership if it will do some good for people who otherwise might not have such an opportunity. Good luck!
lender.occupational_info: My works is in the service industry. I provide travel related services like booking airlines, hotel and rental car reservations for corporate client around the world.

lender.name: The Campbell Familly
lender.loan_because: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail. (Emerson)
lender.occupational_info: High School Student; Program Director; College Student; Customer Service Representative

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: it just feels nice.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I believe in teaching to fish not just giving fish
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home with my children

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an American graduate student studying in Israel.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO HELP PEOPLE ENJOY THEIR DREAMS AND SUCCEED IN THE BUSINESS THAT THEY CHOOSE FOR THEMSELVES
lender.occupational_info: I WORK FOR THE FAMILY COURT SYSTEM OF NORTH CAROLINA

lender.name: Leon & Michele
lender.loan_because: it fills me with hope to know that technology can help bridge the gap that the digital divide has created. Im glad to know our contribution will assist in the materialization of someone's dream. I marvel with admiration and humility to the resilient spirit of people who are courageous enough to embark on an entrepreneurial journey!
lender.occupational_info: I am a novelist and my wife is a nurse :)

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: Hey, it just feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer software for a local police department.

lender.name: WabNishKum
lender.loan_because: To help someone is one of the great joys of life.
lender.occupational_info: I manage fire in wilderness areas so that the natural process of fire in forests is maintained as well as protecting private and public property

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: in memory of Christopher our beloved cat

lender.name: BradleyT
lender.loan_because: I want to help people improve their lives
lender.occupational_info: I work in a silicon valley technology company.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I think loans to start businesses are more effective and sustainable than handouts when trying to combat poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur in the financial services industry.

lender.name: Redic
lender.loan_because: I once owned a business. My venture was made possible by people who took a chance on me. This is a great way to pay their kindness forward and contribute to the success of others.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together. How lucky we are to be able to help empower others.
lender.occupational_info: Musician/Entrepreneur

lender.name: Pontiac UMC Jr. High
lender.loan_because: We're using the Lord's gifts to help others

lender.name: John - Novato, CA, USA
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is important that we take care of each other. Governments do such a poor job of getting things done.
lender.occupational_info: I work with architects and engineers to get construction permits from government offices.

lender.name: Pedro
lender.loan_because: I like seeing money transformed into something valuable.
lender.occupational_info: I use computers to accelerate businesses.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.occupation: retired teacher, school administrator, active coac

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to help people become independent. I give Kiva Gift Certificates as gifts to friends and relatives on special occasions because I feel that it spreads the word on helping others. I encourage you to use Kiva for gift giving.

lender.name: Debbye Cannon
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed and I believe in supporting women who are working to improve life for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I help women find ways to work smart to support their businesses and family life.

lender.name: The Brown Family
lender.loan_because: my family would like to help others.

lender.name: vijay
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO HELP PEOPLE IN NEED

lender.name: Romel
lender.loan_because: While I support my local community, I also think it is important to support other local communities around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage computer servers and desktops for a large environmental NGO in the US.

lender.name: Bregje Peys
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I love the individual stories of entrepreneurs from around the world on Kiva. I believe that highly motivated people can improve their lives, and the lives of their families, if they are given the opportunity and the support.
lender.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs to start and grow technology companies.

lender.name: Jimmy & Sindu
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to do our little part in helping others build their future.
lender.occupational_info:
Sindu is a civil architect who works in Atlanta.
Jimmy is a software developer working in Atlanta.

lender.name: Peter & Judy
lender.loan_because: We like the idea of helping those less fortunate than ourselves become autonomous through their own efforts, as well as the continuous process of helping others as loans are repaid. When we learnt about Kiva we suggested our family consider a gift certificate for a loan instead of giving us Christmas gifts this year.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: It takes so little to help, and the results can be life changing for everyone involved.

lender.name: JOHN
lender.loan_because: WE DO NOT NEED BANKS ANYMORE

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Having traveled all over the world I realize how fortunate I am and how much there is that I can do to help.
lender.occupational_info: Guardian of the Sea.

lender.name: CHAFFIN
lender.loan_because: to create a link with some peoples in the world and to help if possible
lender.occupational_info: My job ? I'm in charge with building sites for a sliding doors company.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I can afford to, and it seems like a much more focussed way to aleviate poverty than simply giving money to wasteful NGOs.
lender.occupational_info: I am the CEO of Carbon Planet, a company dedicated to reducing greenhouse gas emisisons through measurement (emissions audits), reduction strategies and properly certified carbon offsets. See http://www.carbonplanet.com for more on Carbon Planet.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I care about the world\'s poor.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a Christian ministry to build spiritual movements everywhere that combine the message of Jesus as King with community transformation.

lender.name: anastasia
lender.loan_because: I am currently reading \"Banker to the Poor\" by Muhammad Yunus and I wanted take part in a micro-credit program.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: it's needed & I can do it.
lender.occupational_info: I help people in need in the U.S. to start businesses and earn a living wage.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I realize how fortunate I am, and I appreciate how hard working and entrepreneurial these individuals are. I would like to share some of what I have with others who can in turn make a difference in their own communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work with internal clients in a provincial government department. I help these clients manage and optimize their IT based business initiatives.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: having a business allows one to feel good about oneself while supporting one's family.
lender.occupational_info: I teach science and math to students aged 11-14.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is one of the best sustainable ways to end poverty
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying International Affairs. Id also like to be a paramedic.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: Christ is Beautiful, and helping others pleases The Beautiful One, which brings me joy. (The avatar is artist He Qi's "Escape Into Egypt")

lender.name: carlos
lender.loan_because: helps people, well i'm indonesian.
lender.occupational_info: making internet works

lender.name: Adam Brankamp
lender.loan_because: It's my small way of encouraging the entrepreneurial spirit of people who need it the most. I love being able to participate from thousands of miles away. Hopefully someday day I'll be able to help out in person.

lender.name: Jason & Jacquie
lender.loan_because: We believe that if everyone plays a small part communities can come together to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: just trying to make the world a better place man
lender.occupational_info: i like to sleep,eat and chase cats mainly

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I like the idea helping a specific person improve their lives, and lives of those around them. That they are getting loans, and not handouts, greatly increases the prospect that these entrepreneurs lives will improve for the long term.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help people help themselves & may God bless their endeavors.
lender.occupational_info: Give direction to a team of folks who do amazing work creating software applications.

lender.name: Rayn
lender.loan_because: I feel that so much donated money gets lost in processing. I am trying this out because it looks like a great way to create sustainability and improve the businesses and lives of families around the world who are working hard. Together we can work towards advantaging all while disadvantaging none. The more money I put in this system the more I can help and keep helping as it keeps coming back. I feel the interest paid on an investment like this is far more valuable for our world in the long run than more money coming back to me than I put in.
lender.occupational_info: I fix the computers for a few hundred people and make sure that everyone is happy and can do their jobs efficiently while also teaching them how to use them better. I have always been drawn to helping people but I have learned to love the idea of helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I help graduates of an art school find work in their field.

lender.name: Larry & Kathy
lender.loan_because: We are able to do so.

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: I can help others.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my babies - any woman in any part of the world knows what this is about.

lender.name: Melissa&Corey
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am in sales- I have a number of companies that I sell our product to and I service these stores over the phone. These companies are usually small family owned businesses.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for everything I have in my life and want to make a difference in the lives of others while they pursue their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school students who are learning English as their second language.

lender.name: jd
lender.loan_because: microfinance is effective way to relieve suffering and reduce poverty.

lender.name: Jane and Kevin
lender.loan_because: We want to be better citizens of this planet.\r\n\r\nJane also used to live with Matt in Terrapin in Palo Alto.

lender.name: ellen
lender.occupational_info: Dog trainer and guitarist.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I believe in the teach a man how to fish philosophy... I think that lending money is the best way to help another person improve their quality of life while keeping their dignity intact. They are then able to help themselves and their families as well as their communities. How cool is that?
lender.occupational_info: I am a visual arts and French secondary school teacher.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Small acts can have enormous outcomes.

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: We\'re all in this together.....
lender.occupational_info: Full time graduate student studying International & Development Economics at the University of San Francisco.

lender.name: kurt
lender.loan_because: i'm blessed with an easy life.
lender.occupational_info: i design and build custom homes in northern california.

lender.name: Sami
lender.loan_because: I simply want to...

lender.name: Stephen Suarez
lender.loan_because: It is very exciting to be a part of all of the businesses that I am helping to fund.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a Brokerage firm in New York City for a company that analyzes the stock market.

lender.name: Robert
lender.occupational_info: Optometrist- I give sight to the blind.

lender.name: AkaWesley
lender.loan_because: My Dad worked his grocery store to help me have a better life. His legacy will be helping others around the world do the same thing for their children.

lender.name: Mike
lender.occupation: US Peace Corps Macedonia - Local Econ Devlpmt
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to work, live and love.
lender.occupational_info: Increase international understanding between people in the US and Macedonia, and work to create sustainable and positive development in Macedonia.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: When we care for others that we do not know - we give Hope. They nurture that Hope and it grows.
lender.occupational_info: To do the best I can with what I have.

lender.name: Anjoum
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in need in an effective way. If we just gave needy people supplies they wouldn't know how to obtain them when the supply runs out. Kiva donates money to them to start up their bussiness. That is why I support kiva

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I care about the communities in which I work. The mining industry is often portrayed as greedy and exploitative. My personal experience is that the mining industry is comprised of individual people with big hearts who truly care about the people, communities, and environment around us.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a geologist for a mining company operating in Latin America. I have also worked in socially and environmentally responsible mines in Australia and Tanzania and have seen the benefits of mining in these communities.

lender.name: Patt & James
lender.occupational_info: We both work for nonprofits that benefit children.

lender.name: Florence
lender.loan_because: It's one tiny step I can make as an individual towards creating a more egalitarian world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired teacher, now trying to "give back" by helping teacher candidates learn their craft and get their teaching credentials.

lender.name: Stefano
lender.loan_because: I believe that sustainable development, encouraged by microfinancing, is an important means towards the eradication of poverty.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I am able to.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the Marine Corps, and work on helicopters. I have been married for four years and have a three year old son.

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: Right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: Helping others

lender.name: jeff
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Journalist

lender.name: Remay and Mike
lender.loan_because: We like helping other people.
lender.occupational_info: Michael is the computer guy and Remay is responsible in promoting public oral health.

lender.name: Gordon and Maureen
lender.loan_because: To make hope come true and we want to help the world become a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Teach 7th and 8th grade children Math and to help adults with their elderly parents as they grow older and need services.

lender.name: Ultra1bob
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can do it.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small publishing company affiliated with an eastern religious organization.

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: I find this to be an incredibly sophisticated means of making a difference in our world.
lender.occupational_info: Help others buy and sell homes and land.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: every starfish counts
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in college, studying business, art, environmental studies and education. One day I hope to start my own business as well.

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: I like helping people help themselves. Also I like Karma.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an expert on The United States Income Tax.

lender.name: Bil
lender.loan_because: Having worked all through the Caribbean and travelled throughout Mexico, I know without doubt how fortunate I am. I am in a position to help in some small way those who need just that boost to be independent and successful.
lender.occupational_info: I teach teachers at a college. The program is dedicated to First Nations people, Aboriginal ancestry and is intended to build capacity in the small First Nations' communities in the Yukon Territory, Canada.

lender.name: Mitchell
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in advertising. Which is basically the job of convincing people to buy a product or purchace a service through print and TV advertisments.

lender.name: Arturo
lender.loan_because: Others deserve the opportunities that I’ve been lucky enough to have been given.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to have a better life. A little help can go a long way to make a big difference. I feel grateful to live the life that I have and want to help others who haven't had the opportunities and assistance just because of where they happen to live in the world.

lender.name: Doerschlers
lender.loan_because: We're trying to do our small part in helping people. We want to work through an organization that empowers people.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: my best friend spent 3 years in africa with the peace corps. she reminds me every day that we can all do a little more.
lender.occupational_info: phd student, rhetoric & composition

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I think this is the best way to promote economic growth and democracy in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the global financial market

lender.name: Sarah & Ben, KivaFriends
lender.loan_because: We know the people we loan to will use the money well to make their lives and that of their community better, and we loan to establish connections between ourselves and both small businesses and other lenders.
lender.occupational_info: Sarah works in a university library and is studying to become a children's librarian. Ben is studying and teaching computer science and plans to be a university professor.

lender.name: Nauert family
lender.loan_because: We want to share the opportunities and blessings we have been given.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family of five, 3 children ages 20, 18 and 14. Dad is an engineer, Mom is an educator, our oldest son and daughter are in college and our youngest daughter is starting high school. Our daughters gave us the money and Kiva web address as a Christmas gift, so that we could make this loan.

lender.name: brian
lender.loan_because: If you have the means to help others and choose not to then what good are you?
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large international communications corp. in a main central office in north Texas region.

lender.name: Ajay
lender.loan_because: It is my duty as a global citizen.
lender.occupational_info: Helping create new medicines for diseases in the developed world.

lender.name: Tina&Thomas
lender.loan_because: We want to give others a chance to enrich their lives, while creating a cycle of wealth in our own lives.
lender.occupational_info: We are embarking on new avocations with which to create positive change while doing something insanely fun!

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I like to help others
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I have a auto repair and towing business

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people out, but am afraid of how little control I have with charity. I feel that this will also allow for everyone to benefit. My friend told me about Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student in Computer Science, and I\\\'m getting my education so I can in turn teach others as a professor(teacher) myself.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: anyone who wants to improve their life and the life of their family deserves a chance.

lender.name: LLCC International Club
lender.loan_because: We believe in change

lender.name: gabriella
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place. Lending money to people who really need the loans is a much better use of my money than spending it on things for myself that I don't even need.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the vault at a casino.

lender.name: Western Illinois Univ
lender.loan_because: This is a great opportunity to give people around the world the chance to become successful entrepreneurs. As a Finance Club, we are also interested in observing micro-lending first-hand.
lender.occupational_info: We are a student organization interested in all areas of finance.

lender.name: Amy P
lender.loan_because: I love that you can watch the progress of the person you loan to and when its repaid you can help someone else!
lender.occupational_info: I work in the legal department of a company that owns shopping malls around the United States. My job includes drafting legal documents such as leases for tenants.

lender.name: Fizzy
lender.loan_because: they deserve it.

lender.name: scott
lender.loan_because: its an easy thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: building businesses and teaching others how to do so.

lender.name: Nora
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of the world community..one who can help in a small way, to have a chance to change the life of others.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: Micocredit is more sustainable than donations. I love how there is virtually no "middle man" organization siphoning off administrative funds.
lender.occupational_info: I plan and manage international projects and programs for organizations who work in developing nations.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I think everybody should have an opportunity to improve their lives.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I\'ve been on short term mission\'s trips and have met these beautiful people. They are strong, proud and desire the same things I do. The ability to support a loving family, do something meaningful with their lives and make a difference in the world.\r\nWho would not want to offer a tiny bit of my income to provide the opportunity for them.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I cannot afford not to.

lender.name: Rita, Tom & Family
lender.loan_because: As a family, we have enough and are able to share with others that must provide for their family.
lender.occupational_info: Tom and I are retired. In my profession, I worked with refugee & immigrants who were resettled in our State. My husband was a masonry contractor who built with brick, block, stone and river rock.

lender.name: Saul
lender.loan_because: It\'s the life blood of any entrepreneur, being an investor.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: It is a simple thing to do, and it might help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers. I program them, fix them, build them. I am studying to be a shaman, which does not explain the African garb in my picture: my colleagues asked me to wear it for a party.

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: I thank Kiva for putting all the pieces together and delivering help. I wish you continued success. Thanks again.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: It feels good to give back.
lender.occupational_info: University student and volunteer county Sheriff.

lender.name: Tragen
lender.loan_because: When i do it i kinda forget about my problems and i look at how much worse my life could be and i just want to help
lender.occupational_info: I'm in school

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I believe that I as a US citizen can have a positive impact on the welfare of other people world-wide who otherwise have limited access to credit, and by loaning them the needed capital, allow their businesses to succeed! It often makes my day when enough funds are repaid so that I can then re-lend my funds to a new person or group, and then follow their progress afterwards!

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I'm delighted to help another small businessperson succeed!
lender.occupational_info: I offer secretarial and bookkeeping services to other small businesses in my town at their place of business, out of my home office, or across the internet. I also have a "cottage craft" business of making cards and calendars out of my own photography.

lender.name: Jenny and Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life. I want to make the world a better place for both my son and others' children.
lender.occupational_info: I study Russian literature and teach the Russian language.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to imporve their lives.

lender.name: Vaughn
lender.loan_because: Human beings need financial and spritual capital. See more at twitter.com/vaughnwoods.
lender.occupational_info: Owner: Vaughn Woods Financial Group: www. vaughnwoods.com

lender.name: James Vollmer, RCDD
lender.loan_because: Without getting to Religious. I believe in helping those who help themselves, the old teach a man to fish theory.
lender.occupational_info: I manage an office that manages field employess installing voice and data cables, along with networking and phone systems equipment.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people just as I have been helped in the past.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Special Education teacher, and helps students with a variety of special needs. It is a joy and challenge, but I love what I do.

lender.name: Jason Massey
lender.occupation: Venture Consultant (that is me in the gray tshirt)
lender.loan_because: Pretty simple...a little goes a long way. What equals a nice dinner for many of us equals a life changing catalyst for others. If you could facilitate that kind of change with so little why wouldn\'t you???????
lender.occupational_info: I work with technology startups in Silicon Valley to help them launch and grow their business. I love helping entrepreneurs succeed. Kiva entrepreneurs need MUCH less money for MUCH more direct impact with less hand holding than a SV startup :)

lender.name: Segreto
lender.occupation: IT guy for the greater good.
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I keep computers running at a non-profit.

lender.name: Kevin and Carol
lender.loan_because: it's a justice issue, not charity. Everyone deserves a chance to support themselves and their family. Micro-loans provide this opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I perform maintenance on a church building and my wife, Carol, teaches third grade and includes environmental and global social issues in the curriculum.

lender.name: Albert Albo Cruz
lender.loan_because: Because I should and its in my fathers name
lender.occupational_info: ECM Analyst then Associate

lender.name: Eleni
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a university while earning my graduate degree in philosophy.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: The little we all do can move mountains.
lender.occupational_info: I help to make wilderness healthy.

lender.name: Norm
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I look after program management for a wireless communications company.

lender.name: Marion
lender.loan_because: I admire these entrepreneurs and I am happy to help. They are the key for the development of their country.
lender.occupational_info: I build up contracts for any kind of transactions (purchase, sale, financing) and try to arrange commercial/contractual difficulties.

lender.name: Oliver
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I help to start-up, grow and turnaround businesses.

lender.name: timothy
lender.loan_because: i have just concluded a training on how to trade forex/fx market, so i need a loan from kiva to start up.

lender.name: Chantal
lender.loan_because: to help people growing by theirselves

lender.name: Clay
lender.loan_because: Small loan amounts can make a big difference in peoples' lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher.

lender.name: edmundo
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others help themselves.

lender.name: Victoria L
lender.loan_because: Sharing is the true human spirit, and respect the birthright of every person. Congratulations to the people and customers of Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to figure out how to sell their products by communicating well with their customers.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of individuals to improve their lives and the lives of others. This is a way to give them a hand up instead of a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I am a partner in a firm that designs roads, bridges, storm drainage and sanitary sewer improvements. I am a civil engineer and a land surveyor. I locate and mark out on the ground the property that people own. Often, we design the improvements that are made on that land.

lender.name: Cody
lender.loan_because: Getting investment capital to motivated people is a great way to break the cycle of generational poverty.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I feel we are all responsible to help other, as others have helped us. \"Compassion is the radicalism of our time.\" (from His Holiness the 14th Dalai Lama)
lender.occupational_info: I teach elementary students world music and creative technology. I am honored to learn and grow from these young souls each day.

lender.name: Milton
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a designer and teacher.

lender.name: Sara and Tim
lender.loan_because: We loan because our mission in life is to make a meaningful difference in the lives of our brothers and sisters in this life. We are very blessed and we strive to share our blessings.
lender.occupational_info: We work with people to help them achieve their dreams through realizing the great potential that is in them.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: As Danny Thomas once said, "Success has nothing to do with what you gain in life or accomplish for yourself. It’s what you do for others."

lender.name: Kirkwood
lender.loan_because: To create economic opportunity by funding small entrepreneurial enterprises in less developed nations.
lender.occupational_info:
SIFE is a global non-profit organization active in more than 40 countries. SIFE is funded by financial contributions from corporations, entrepreneurs, foundations, government agencies and individuals. Working in partnership with business and higher education, SIFE establishes student teams on university campuses. These teams are led by faculty advisors and they are challenged to develop community outreach projects that reach SIFE's five educational topics:

Market Economics 
Success Skills 
Entrepreneurship 
Financial Literacy 
Business Ethics

lender.name: Figota Enterprises
lender.loan_because: We believe that the spirit of Entrepreneurship should be kept alive on a Global scale.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I'm always willing to help others help themselves. It's a pleasure and a privilege to have a means to do so.

lender.name: Yemisrach
lender.loan_because: the greatest social service that can be render by anybody to the country and to mankind is to bring up a family...by George Bernard Shaw. I yearn to be trapped in humanity by helping others bring up their family. And most of all, I know that they will use the money more wisely than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an engineer in a Biotech/Diagnostic company in discovery, development, production and marketing of novel health care diagnostic medical devices and solutions. And also, working closely with Kiva in exploring opportunities to establish Kiva partnership in Ethiopia.

lender.name: Jarom Smith
lender.loan_because: I can use all the good karma I can get!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small software company full-time, and I work in real estate part-time.

lender.name: St. Paul Just Falcons
lender.occupation: Catholic Faith and Social Justice Club
lender.loan_because: Microcredit is one of the best ways we can imagine to exercise the \"preferential option for the struggling\". People know what they need and they know how to go about it. They simply need others to have faith in their dreams. We need each other.
lender.occupational_info: We do various projects to help make this community one of peace, justice and love and to bring peace, justice and love to the surrounding community and world.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: I am a citizen of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer--I shoot for various clients around the country.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I have needed money to start a business and I know first hand that most investors are pigs. Good luck !
lender.occupational_info: Boring software stuff.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: makes my day!
lender.occupational_info: physical education

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others help themselves.

lender.name: Baudouin
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: paediatrician

lender.name: Maurice
lender.loan_because: It is a good idea and I like it very much.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: It is a satisfying feeling to be able to help others and watch their progress..

lender.name: Victoria Matthews
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are less able to be independent than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children ages 1 year to 15 years old. I ran a Montessori School. Now I train teachers.

lender.name: Louisa
lender.loan_because: I want to help out, and this seems like a good, fair organization.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a magazine, checking for mistakes. I also like to write short stories.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: It lowers the barriers to success.
lender.occupational_info: I help create social enterprises for an employment service non-profit (www.aboutchallenge.org) and serve on the board of a new cleantech start-up (www.synairco.com).

lender.name: Rebecca & Sean
lender.loan_because: my mom taught me to share when I was little and I try to continue this very important lesson in my adulthood.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: It is a small thing to do that can help make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: Program computers to help doctors and medical care.

lender.name: Teens
lender.loan_because: We loan because we feel it is our duty and priviage to help those that can not help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We are a high school charity orginization.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I want to help deserving people.J\'aime aider les gens qui deserve de l\'aide.

lender.name: Ocek
lender.loan_because: I am given, and I gladly give back !
lender.occupational_info: Teaching and Learning Research

lender.name: judy
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving a helping hand to those who have a vision to succeed and are focused on results.
lender.occupational_info: I worked on financial statements to calculate profits for a very large company.

lender.name: Teena
lender.loan_because: I have always wanted to help fund someones dream but did not have a way to do it. Kiva has made that possible. Thank you.
lender.occupational_info: I sell Chinese Porcelain Vases and Ginger Jars at my site www.BlueWhiteVases.com

lender.name: Gene
lender.loan_because: For a small amount, i'm helping someone improve their quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I invest in real estate and manage a small business.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: its my responsibility to give to those who are less fortunate than me.

lender.name: Mark A.
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is the best gift you can give!
lender.occupational_info: I work in outside sales

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a lot. I have everything I need. It makes me feel so good to help someone else succeed and do something that genuinely helps them better themselves and better support their family.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate activities that promote understanding of watershed restoration and conservation efforts, and promote the restoration and conservation efforts using media outlets.

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: A small step up, delivered at the right time, can lead to a huge leap....

lender.name: Vincent & Valerie
lender.loan_because: it matters

lender.name: Alejandra
lender.loan_because: I believe that this type of help is the most effective!

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want to help others whenever I can.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: It is a tangible way to contribute to the well-being of people in need and their communities. I also like that when a loan is repayed, the same money can be used to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I am a law student at UC Davis, uncertain of what type of law I will practice but hopeful that I will be able to help people.

lender.name: The Connett
lender.loan_because: To help our children learn that there is more to this world then our own little space.

lender.name: Unitarian Church
lender.loan_because: We are a group of women who wish to help other women around the world
lender.occupational_info: We knit shawls and give them as gifts to people who need them for comfort or for celebration

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Francine
lender.loan_because: I believe it is useful to help people develop small businesses. It provides them with a sense of achievement, self-worth and pride when they reach their goals.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: Life's been good to me so far.

lender.name: Laurine
lender.loan_because: I have two small businesses of my own and I know how difficult it is to deal with regular banks in that situation. I want to help other people who can\'t get a bank loan! I like knowing something about the people to whose businesses I am contributing.
lender.occupational_info: I\'m a senior citizen who has been disabled with chronic illness for about 30 years. I have a company that manages the administrative work of my husband\\\\\\\'s consulting business. Together we raise little white dogs called Bichon Bolognese.

lender.name: Al W
lender.loan_because: It\\\'s a great way to get \\\"directly\\\" involved.

lender.name: Brooke
lender.loan_because: I can. I believe I am called by Christ to be an advocate for social justice, and this is one way to do that.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I\\\'m teaching a social-justice curriculum, and my class and I want to experience firsthand the power of one small act of kindness -- in this case, lending a small amount of money in the hopes that it will help make a better life for someone in need.

lender.name: Manuel
lender.loan_because: I work in Microfinance and I understand first hand the impact that these seemingly small loans can have on someone's business and life.

lender.name: XNet
lender.loan_because: We want to help other entrepreneurs across the globe to have an opportunity to make themselves successful.
lender.occupational_info: We are a business to business Internet provider. We are success driven entrepreneurs, just like these people below. But in a different place, with a different face.

lender.name: Heidi Sumser
lender.occupational_info: I work in development finance in banks that are part of an international group which specialize in financial services for micro, small and medium-size enterprises.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: I want to see economic development improve around the world, not just a few locations.
lender.occupational_info:
I am currently taking some courses for personal growth. I enjoy ballroom dancing and vegan cooking.
Also I have had a long held interest in economic theory and history.

lender.name: CCC-Kelowna
lender.loan_because: We want to give people a hand up in life rather than just a hand out.

lender.name: CARLO BETTY LORENZO
lender.loan_because: is the best way to help someone!!

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: It's a neat idea. This is the future of finance.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a physics lab that studies the origin of the universe.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I am a mom and I have spent many years giving to my family. It is time for me to give to others like me who work hard for their families and their communities...
lender.occupational_info: I teach young children who have special challenges in the classroom (special education teacher).

lender.name: Sociology 362
lender.loan_because: Sociology 362 (Spring 2007) was a class that studied globalization, and microfinance shows the positive side of globalization.
lender.occupational_info: The University of San Diego is a Catholic post-secondary educational institution that places an emphasis on "values based" education.

lender.name: vincent
lender.loan_because: I loan because i want make difference through loan,i can make difference with little things,and other peoples can make a difference with little they have,
lender.occupational_info: i am very polite ,truthfull and caring person,i always beleive that together we can make difference,because ,Iron sharpeneth Iron.

lender.name: Waters Family
lender.loan_because: The money we may lose would not change my life style, but that same money will help change someone else’s life style.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the computer field and my wife works in the corporate tax field.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I like the beauty of empowering people instead of just handing them something that can help them for a few minutes. Kiva loans allow them to take what we loan them and make something lasting for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I hope that my work helps others love their work more.

lender.name: TIES
lender.loan_because: we realized that helping those who wish to better themselves, and their local area, by working smarter is the most effective way of evening the global economy.
lender.occupational_info: We are a student run technological and entrepreneurial organization at the University of Missouri - Rolla. We gather weekly to fullfil our needs to be enthusiastic about business ventures and new products and ideas. Our group advisor saw a T.V. show on KIVA one day and suggested that we, as a group, give to one of KIVA\\\'s hopefuls. The group quickly accepted this as a wonderful idea and within the month we have sent out two $25 loans. Once these return (we are very optomistic) we will immediately reinvest an increased amount.

lender.name: Regina
lender.loan_because: I saw the Kiva Organization mission on my center for public television channel and I felt compelled!

lender.name: Anushka
lender.loan_because: I am ecstatic about helping communities of color take a step out of poverty in a sustainable, effective way.
lender.occupational_info: I work with amazing farmers in rural Kenya who are growing their way out of hunger. Check out our website to see how you can get involved at www.oneacrefund.org

lender.name: Timothy R. Yee
lender.loan_because: I believe in corporate responsibility and doing our best to end the cycle of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Socially responsible investing: I help individuals and businesses formulate sound investments that reflect their values.

lender.name: Derrick
lender.loan_because: My Grandma and Grandpa Milloy taught me that it is better to give than receive, i am forever hooked on this way of living, its the best!

lender.name: LCSJ
lender.loan_because: The Lawyer's Council for Social Justice is a group of law students looking to make a difference early in our legal careers.
lender.occupational_info: Studying Law

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: i love helping others help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I manufacture greenhouse kits and sell flowers at local farmers markets .The nursery business has been very good to me.

lender.name: Noah
lender.loan_because: I think this site is awesome. You can keep on making a difference over and over again. Even if it is small at least it is something.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain my company's network infrastructure.

lender.name: Jenna
lender.loan_because: I want to see people everywhere reach their potential. I like knowing that all the money I give will be used to help someone reach their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work with large companies to help them put their advertisements in magazines, tv, internet, and other places

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe that most people just need a chance that social and economic forces prevent them from having. I know that individuals can make a great difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an organization that helps nonprofit organizations that work with children under 5 and their families. I help the organizations show the effects they have and learn to do things better.

lender.name: Sydney
lender.loan_because: everybody deserves an opportunity.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I can; not many have the privilege.
lender.occupational_info: I sell books and magazines to support my education, as well as selling tickets to a circus.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of others and I am fortunate enough to have the ability to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I work on developing new medicines for untreated diseases.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: I help those in need financially even though I am in financial need
lender.occupational_info: to teach languages/cultures to several areas of the world is a goal I am aiming for

lender.name: Maryanne
lender.loan_because: In 1994 I was working in another industry when I was laid off in a corporate merger. I ended up having to change careers and needed $600. to go back to school to finish the real estate classes I needed to obtain my Appraisal License. For me, at that time in my life, $600 was a real deal breaker. Because someone had faith in me and helped me many years ago by making that loan, I am in a position to help someone else today.
lender.occupational_info: I am a licensed real estate appraiser in the State of Arizona. I do residential real estate appraisal and own my own business.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: Solidarity will make a change.
lender.occupational_info: Happiness

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I have the luck to live in a secure and rich country, this is the minimum that I can do..
lender.occupational_info: I work in a company library, I buy scientific books, I search for interesting informations for our business (chemistry)

lender.name: Danijel
lender.loan_because: I really believe that small gestures of generosity can change somebody\'s life out there, somewhere far from me, who does not get to enjoy the same luxury and the same meaningless scale of problems that I do. While I get to worry about things like work stress or small arguments, other people worry about having something to eat or feed their family with. So here is to making a world a bit of a happier place for some of them...
lender.occupational_info: I work in one of the biggest consumer goods corporations in the world, in charge of managing several products with my team for an entire region in Europe. It\'s a stressful, but very fulfilling work... And I am happy to share a small fruit of that labor with those that don\\\'t get the opportunity to reap such fruits.

lender.name: Octavio
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are willing to work.

lender.name: michaela
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves the chance, at bare minimum, to be self-sufficient. I would hope if I was in need someone would help me. A lot of life is luck. The rest is hard work. I've been lucky. I am grateful for that. And with that gratitude comes a desire to give back and "pay it forward." I admire all these people who are working so hard and trying to make their dreams come true against trying odds. I loan because... we are all connected and if someone on the other side of the planet can better their life, we are all better.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because:

Iris E. Mayo 9-13-50 - 12-10-05

lender.name: Yonatan
lender.loan_because: None of us are free if one of us is chained

lender.name: valerie
lender.occupational_info: I work on development projects in Zambia including micro credits.

lender.loan_because: I should.
